T02D2498:261b-0: @261b ` // sa dang shing dang rdo'i cho ga bzhugs /
T02D2498:261b-2: * // dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2498:261b-3: lha yi rnal 'byor dang ldan pas //
T02D2498:261b-4: sa gzhi mchod pa mchog bsgrubs te //
T02D2498:261b-5: lha las ldang bar byas nas ni //
T02D2498:261b-6: de nas sa gzhi sbyar bar bya //
T02D2498:261b-7: de la slob dpon gyis rang gi 'dod pa'i lha'i
T02D2498:261b-8: rnal 'byor byas te mtshan mo'i dus su gzhon nu
T02D2498:261b-9: ma gcig gdong shar du phyogs pa la mchod pa
T02D2498:261b-11: kye bcom ldan 'das ma dge ba dang mi dge ba smros shig ces brjod de /
T02D2498:261b-20: dza rnams tshig gi thog mar byung ba'i de'i brjod pa ma 'khrul par rjes su dpag par bya'o //
T02D2498:261b-21: de mig dgu pa'i sa rnams la der gal te
T02D2498:261b-22: byang du aa yi ga thog mar gyur pa de'i
T02D2498:261b-23: tshe nges par shar gyi phyogs su rkang pas lhag
T02D2498:261b-24: pa'i khru gang gi 'og na srog chags gnyis kyi
T02D2498:261b-25: zug rdu'o // de ma phyung na rigs rgyud dang
T02D2498:261b-26: rang gi chung ma 'chi ba dang me'i 'jigs pa'i
T02D2498:261b-27: zug rdu'o // skyon 'byung ngo // ka dang por
T02D2498:261b-28: brjod na byang du me'i zug rngu ste rgyal rigs
T02D2498:261b-29: kyi rus pa rkang pa gnyis kyis lhag pa'i khru
T02D2498:261b-31: de gal te ma phyung na de'i tshe nad sna tshogs dang /
T02D2498:261b-32: me'i 'jigs pa dang don nyams pa rgyal pos gzir ba rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2498:261b-33: pa dang por brjod na byang dang lho'i phyogs su
T02D2498:261b-34: rkang pas dman pa'i khru gnyis kyi 'og na rje'u
T02D2498:262a-2: de ma phyung na phyi dang nang du tsha gdung dang don nyams par 'gyur ro //
T02D2498:262a-3: ta dang po dang phyi mar brjod na srin po'i
T02D2498:262a-4: phyogs na dmangs rigs kyi rus pa'i dum bu mtho
T02D2498:262a-6: de gal te ma phyung na da'i tshe nad sna
T02D2498:262a-7: tshogs kyis gzir ba dang me'i 'jigs pa dang khyim
T02D2498:262a-9: tsa dang por brjod na chu'i phyogs su bram ze'i
T02D2498:262a-10: rus pa'i zug rdu rkang pas lhag pa'i khru gnyis
T02D2498:262a-11: kyi 'og na'o // de ma phyung na khyim mes 'jig par 'gyur ro //
T02D2498:262a-12: sa dang po dang phyi mar yod na rlung gi
T02D2498:262a-13: phyogs su sa'i bdag po'i rgyud kyi rus pa'i zug
T02D2498:262a-14: rdu 'byung ste phyed dang bcas pa'i mtho gnyis kyi
T02D2498:262a-15: 'og nas so // de ma phyung na mdza' ba
T02D2498:262a-16: yun thung ba nyid dang mya ngan du 'gyur ro
T02D2498:262a-17: 'og nas so // // ha dang por brjod na
T02D2498:262a-18: byang gi phyogs su rkang pa gsum gyis lhag pa'i
T02D2498:262a-19: khru gnyis kyi 'og na rje'u rigs kyi skye bo'i
T02D2498:262a-20: rus pa'i zug rdu ste 'dis ni skyes pa dang
T02D2498:262a-21: bud med rnams tshe thung ba nyid du 'gyur ro
T02D2498:262a-22: 'og nas so // // // ba yig dang po
T02D2498:262a-23: dang phyi mar yod na dbang ldan du mtho gsum
T02D2498:262a-24: na dmangs rigs kyi rus pa'o //
T02D2498:262a-25: yang na byi la'i rus pa dang lcags dang sol ba yod do //
T02D2498:262a-26: de ma phyung bar bzhag na rgyud kyi nor nyams par 'gyur ro //
T02D2498:262a-27: dza dang po dang phyi mar brjod na de'i dbus
T02D2498:262a-28: na bram ze'i rus pa'i zur rdu ste de ma
T02D2498:262a-29: phyung na rgyal po'i chad pas gzir ba dang nor
T02D2498:262a-31: de'i phyir thams cad du nyes pa du ma 'byung ba'i phyir zug rdu rnams dbyung bar bya'o //
T02D2498:262a-32: de nas gzhon nu ma mchod de mdun du yungs
T02D2498:262a-33: kar dkar po dang nim pa'i lo ma la sogs
T02D2498:262a-34: pa g-yas pa'i khu tshur gyis g-yas su bskor zhing
T02D2498:262a-35: g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyis g-yon du bskor nas me
T02D2498:262a-36: la lan gsum du dor bar bya'o //
T02D2498:262a-38: aom sarba p'a pa da ha na badzra sarba p'a bam da ha sv'a h'a /
T02D2498:262a-39: de nas aarka'i ras bal gyis mar me'i sdong bu byas te /
T02D2498:262a-40: til nag po'i snum gyis mar me spar te zug rdu brtag par bya'o //
T02D2498:262a-41: de la phyogs gang du mar me'i rtse mo rgyug
T02D2498:262a-42: pa der nges par zug rdu yod do zhes rtogs
T02D2498:262a-43: par bya'o // gang du mar me rdul gyis bskor ba der zug rdur 'gyur ro //
T02D2498:262b-0: de nas gtor ma dang mchod @262b pa la sogs
T02D2498:262b-1: pa byas nas me tog dang bcas pa'i 'bras yos
T02D2498:262b-4: // / shing gi las zhes gsungs pa de brjod par bya'o //
T02D2498:262b-6: mkhas pas yang dag blangs nas ni //
T02D2498:262b-7: shing gi mgo bor legs bzhag ste ;
T02D2498:262b-8: / bdud rtsi'i me la sbyin sreg bya //
T02D2498:262b-9: de la tshes dang gza' dang rgyu skar bzad po
T02D2498:262b-10: la mchod rten bzhengs pa dang gtsug lag khang la
T02D2498:262b-13: ka ba la sogs pa shing gi rtse mo'i mthar
T02D2498:262b-14: thug pa rnams kyi chu dang zheng dag phya mkhan
T02D2498:262b-15: dang thig skud 'dzin pa la sogs pa rnams kyis
T02D2498:262b-17: shing bzo ba'i 'khor rnams tshogs pa dang mchod sbyin
T02D2498:262b-18: byed pa'i slob dpon dag dang lhan cig nags su
T02D2498:262b-20: nags tshal dang nye bar slebs pa'i dus su bdag
T02D2498:262b-21: nyid las thams cad pa'i gzugs su brtags shing bsams
T02D2498:262b-22: te / rkang pa g-yas mdun du byas nas shar
T02D2498:262b-23: dang byang gi phyogs su gdong phyogs pa'i slob dpon
T02D2498:262b-24: nags tshal gyi phyogs su rab tu zhugs te /
T02D2498:262b-25: lo nyis brgya ma lon pa'i shing rnams ni nye bar mi blang ngo //
T02D2498:262b-26: de la shing rnams ni dvi ke sha ra dang /
T02D2498:262b-49: ro hi n'i la sogs pa shing bzang po du
T02D2498:262b-50: ma gang dang gang du skyes pa'i shing de dag
T02D2498:262b-51: legs par brtags te mtshan mo'i dus su las thams
T02D2498:262b-52: cad pa'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i slob dpon spro
T02D2498:262b-53: ba dang ldan pas shing bzo ba grogs dang bcas
T02D2498:262b-54: pa legs par bsrung ba byas te /
T02D2498:262b-55: nyer spyod lngas bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang phyogs kyi bdag po dang /
T02D2498:263a-1: gi lha la sogs pa rnams yang dag par mchod de /
T02D2498:263a-2: phyogs kyi gtor ma yang byin nas shing bzo ba grogs dang bcas pa bza' ba dang /
T02D2498:263a-6: t'a z'u la la sogs pa rnams kyis yang dag par mgu par byas nas ;
T02D2498:263a-7: 'dod pa'i lha la bcom ldan che ge zhes bya
T02D2498:263a-8: ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis
T02D2498:263a-9: gsol ba btab pas thugs mnyes te /
T02D2498:263a-10: shing bzo ba grogs dang bcas pa dang lhan cig
T02D2498:263a-11: 'dod pa'i lha'i rnal 'byor dang zhi ba'i yid kyis
T02D2498:263a-12: nyal bar bya'o // de la rmi lam bzang po
T02D2498:263a-13: nges par mthong na legs par grub par 'gyur ro
T02D2498:263a-14: nyal bar bya'o // // rmi lam ngan pa thams cad zhi ba'i sngags bzla bar bya'o //
T02D2498:263a-15: de nas snga bar mchod pa thams cad dang yang
T02D2498:263a-16: dag par ldan pa'i slob dpon rnam par snang mdzad
T02D2498:263a-17: chen po'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas der gnas pa'i
T02D2498:263a-18: shing gi lha mo'i gzugs kyi shing gi rgyal po
T02D2498:263a-19: yang dag par mchod par bya'o //
T02D2498:263a-20: de la shing gi lha mo de rnams dang zhing skyong de rnams kyang 'di yin te /
T02D2498:263a-24: mya ngan med pa'i shing rnams la shing gi lha mo gsang ba ma'o //
T02D2498:263a-28: sha ra la'i shing rnams kyi ni 'jig rten gyi ma'o //
T02D2498:263a-29: zhing skyong ri bo chen po'o //
T02D2498:263a-32: ra shing rnams kyi ni rna ba nyed ma'o //
T02D2498:263a-33: zhing skyong shin tu stobs so //
T02D2498:263a-34: tsu ta'i shing la ni aa mbi k'a'o //
T02D2498:263a-36: / ta la'i shing la bde byed ma'o //
T02D2498:263a-37: zhing skyong skra gyen brdzes so //
T02D2498:263a-38: kanda pa'i shing la bzhin bzang ma'o //
T02D2498:263a-39: zhing skyong dril bu chen po'o //
T02D2498:263a-40: ka ranydza la ni ka ranydza ra gnas ma'o //
T02D2498:263a-41: zhing skyong gtum pa'i dril bu'o //
T02D2498:263a-42: sbrang rtsi'i shing la dbang bskur ma'o //
T02D2498:263a-43: zhing skyong skyes pa'i dbang phyug go //
T02D2498:263a-45: zhing skyong su dza ne t'a'o //
T02D2498:263a-46: shri go ra'i shing la dpal chen mo'o //
T02D2498:263a-48: de nas las dang rjes su mthun par shing gi
T02D2498:263a-49: lha mo rnams dang zhing skyong rnams kyi yang rnam
T02D2498:263b-0: pa bsgoms nas rang @263b rang gi sngags kyis mchod
T02D2498:263b-4: aom aem gu hya k'a yin ma: sv'a h'a /
T02D2498:263b-5: de bzhin du aom mam ma h'a me ra we na ma: sv'a h'a /
T02D2498:263b-6: aom l'am lo ka m'a tri k'a yee na ma: sv'a h'a /
T02D2498:263b-7: aom aa: aa ti pa l'a ya na ma: sv'a h'a /
T02D2498:263b-8: aom k'am karnna mo ti k'a yee na ma: sv'a h'a /
T02D2498:263b-9: aom ba: ba l'a ya na ma: sv'a h'a /
T02D2498:263b-10: aom aam aam bi k'a yee na ma: sv'a h'a /
T02D2498:263b-11: aom a'um a'um rdha ke sh'a ya na ma: sv'a h'a /
T02D2498:263b-12: aom sham sham ka ri k'a yee na ma: sv'a h'a /
T02D2498:263b-13: aom gham ma h'a gha nt'a ya na ma: sv'a h'a /
T02D2498:263b-14: aom sum su mu kh'a yee na ma: sv'a h'a /
T02D2498:263b-15: aom tsam tsanda ghand'a ya na ma: sv'a h'a /
T02D2498:263b-16: aom kam ka ram dza b'a si nyee na ma: sv'a h'a /
T02D2498:263b-17: aom pum pum se shva r'a ya na ma: sv'a h'a /
T02D2498:263b-18: aom sham shee k'a yee na ma: sv'a h'a /
T02D2498:263b-19: aom sum su dza ne te na ma: sv'a h'a /
T02D2498:263b-20: aom tsam tsand'a lyee na ma: sv'a h'a /
T02D2498:263b-21: aom bam bahni mu kh'a ya na ma: sv'a h'a /
T02D2498:263b-22: aom l'am ma h'a la kshmyee na ma: sv'a h'a /
T02D2498:263b-23: gtsug lag khang gi rgyu yi phyir //
T02D2498:263b-24: bdag ni ljon shing gcad par 'dod //
T02D2498:263b-25: da ni khyed rnams shing gzhan la //
T02D2498:263b-26: gnas te bdag la bzod par mdzod //
T02D2498:263b-27: ces bya ba'i tshigs bcad lan gsum du brjod de //
T02D2498:263b-28: shing la gnas pa'i lha la gsol te /
T02D2498:263b-29: de nas me tog la sogs pas legs par mchod de /
T02D2498:263b-30: shing gzhan la gnas par bsam par bya'o //
T02D2498:263b-31: de nas bsrung ba'i ched du rma bya chen mo bklag par bya'o //
T02D2498:263b-32: de nas las thams cad pa'i gzugs can gyi shing
T02D2498:263b-33: bzo ba gser dang ras dang t'a mb'u la la
T02D2498:263b-34: sogs pa rnams kyis yongs su mgu bar byas te
T02D2498:263b-35: / dgra sta sbrang rtsis byugs te dge ba'i sems
T02D2498:263b-36: kyis shing bzo ba lag pa g-yas pa gyen du
T02D2498:263b-37: / phyogs pa dang / kha byang shar du bltas
T02D2498:263b-38: te nyi ma la bltas nas shing bcad par bya'o
T02D2498:263b-39: / phyogs pa dang / // der yang dge ba
T02D2498:263b-40: dang mi dge ba'i mtshan ma blta bar bya ste
T02D2498:263b-41: mi dge ba'i mtshan ma byung na spang bar bya
T02D2498:263b-42: / phyogs pa dang / // zhing / dge ba'i mtshan ma byung na gzung bar bya'o //
T02D2498:263b-43: gal te shing byang phyogs su lhung bar gyur na
T02D2498:263b-44: de'i tshe mchod sbyin byed pa la nor dang las
T02D2498:263b-46: dbang ldan gyi phyogs su lhung na rig pa dang ye shes kun du 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2498:264a-0: gal te dbang po'i phyogs su shing lhung na de'i tshe @264a * //
T02D2498:264a-1: dpal dang 'byor pa dang rgyas par 'gyur ro //
T02D2498:264a-2: gal te shing gzhan rnam par nyid pa'i bar du
T02D2498:264a-3: lhung bar gyur pa de'i tshe dge ba dang bde
T02D2498:264a-5: gal te shing gzhan ma bcom par lhung na mchod
T02D2498:264a-6: sbyin byed pa la 'jigs pa chen por 'gyur ro
T02D2498:264a-7: // me dang bden bral dang gshin rje dang chu
T02D2498:264a-8: dang rlung gi phyogs rnams su lhung na grangs bzhin
T02D2498:264a-9: du me'i 'jigs pa dang nad dang 'chi ba dang
T02D2498:264a-10: chu dang rlung gi 'jigs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro
T02D2498:264a-11: // // bskyod pa na sgra mi gsal ba ring
T02D2498:264a-12: du grag cing lhung na mchod sbyin byed pa po
T02D2498:264a-13: la sdug bsngal gyi mtshan mar 'gyur ro //
T02D2498:264a-14: gcod pa'i dus su gal te rnga mo dang rta
T02D2498:264a-15: dang ces spyang dang bong bu dang sbrul dang phag
T02D2498:264a-16: dang bya rog la sogs pa gdug pa'i 'dab chags
T02D2498:264a-17: mthong bar gyur na de'i tshe des par gsad pa
T02D2498:264a-18: dang bcing ba dang bgegs du ma 'byung bar 'gyur
T02D2498:264a-19: ro // gal te shing las khrag 'dzag na de'i tshe mchod sbyin byed pa 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2498:264a-20: zho dang mar dang sbrang rtsi dang 'o ma 'dzag
T02D2498:264a-21: na gsad pa dang bcing ba la sogs pa'i 'jigs
T02D2498:264a-23: 'on kyang shing rnams la rang bzhin pa'i mngar ba
T02D2498:264a-24: dang tshab dang kha ba dang bska ba'i bcud 'byung
T02D2498:264a-25: ba de la ni nyes pa med do //
T02D2498:264a-26: sbal pa le brgan gyi mdog can byung na des ni nad 'byung ba rjes su dpag par bya'o //
T02D2498:264a-27: de bzhin du shing gi khong nas bya ba mdog
T02D2498:264a-28: ser skya byung na des chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa
T02D2498:264a-29: dang sv'a sha'i nad 'byung bar rjes su dpag par
T02D2498:264a-30: bya'o // shing gi bar nas rtsangs pa mdog ser
T02D2498:264a-31: po byung na des ni nor nyams par rjes su
T02D2498:264a-32: bya'o // dpag par bya'o // de'i khong nas khyim
T02D2498:264a-33: gyi rtsangs pa phug ron gyi mdog can byung na
T02D2498:264a-34: des mchod sbyin byed pa dbul por 'gyur bar rjes
T02D2498:264a-36: kha dog dmar po'i na k'u ka l'a sha byung
T02D2498:264a-37: na des ni nad 'byung bar rjes su dpag par
T02D2498:264a-38: bya'o // khong nas sbrul sngo bsangs byung na des kyang nor zad pa nyid do //
T02D2498:264a-39: kha tr'u'i mdog can gyi chu byung na des ni chu'i 'jigs pa nyid rjes su dpag par bya'o //
T02D2498:264b-6: sdong ris dang ku sha rnams ni mtshan ma bzang
T02D2498:264b-7: po ste de lta bu la sogs pa dge ba
T02D2498:264b-8: dang mi dge ba'i mtshan ma rnams yongs su shes
T02D2498:264b-9: par byas nas shing gcad par bya'o //
T02D2498:264b-10: de nas shing de dag yang dag par rnam par
T02D2498:264b-11: phye nas rtsa ba dang sked pa dang rtse mo'i
T02D2498:264b-12: mtshams rnams phye ste cha gcig gis lhag pa'i cha
T02D2498:264b-14: shing rnams ji lta bar nags kyi 'khrul 'khor yang
T02D2498:264b-15: de bzhin te mchod rten dang bim ba la sogs
T02D2498:264b-16: pa'i phyir du nags kyi 'khrul 'khor de rnams kyis
T02D2498:264b-18: / rdo ba yang shis pa rnams gzung bar bya zhing mi shis pa rnams spang bar bya'o //
T02D2498:264b-19: de la ri'i ljongs dang ngam grog dang chu 'gram
T02D2498:264b-20: la sogs par gnas pa'i rdo ba mkhregs pa dang
T02D2498:264b-21: sra ba dang dri zhim pa dang shin tu reg
T02D2498:264b-22: na mnyen pa dang dri nga ba med cing 'jam
T02D2498:264b-23: pa dang snum pas ni tshe dang ldan no //
T02D2498:264b-24: 'di la shis pa gnyis te dkar po dang ser po dang dmar po dang ljang gu dag dang /
T02D2498:264b-25: rdo ba nag po la gal te ri mo dkar
T02D2498:264b-26: po phra mo dang thig le dang ldan pa de'i
T02D2498:264b-27: tshe blon dang ldan pa dang /
T02D2498:264b-28: bza' mi'i rgyud dang rigs dang rgyal srid dang nor dang 'bangs rnams la shis so //
T02D2498:264b-29: steng dang byang dang dbang ldan dang shar gyi phyogs
T02D2498:264b-30: su gdong phyogs pas ni grangs bzhin du mkha' spyod
T02D2498:264b-31: kyi dngos grub dang skye bo dang nor dang rigs
T02D2498:264b-32: rgyud 'phel lo // thar pa dang mngon par 'dod
T02D2498:264b-33: pa'i dngos grub sbyin pa'i rdo ba rnams gzung bar
T02D2498:264b-34: rgyud 'phel lo // bya'o // shin tu 'jam pa'i
T02D2498:264b-35: gzong gis bsnun pa na bye ma dang bcas pa
T02D2498:264b-36: rgyud 'phel lo // bya'o // dang // rtsub pa
T02D2498:264b-37: dang bral ba dang gog sgra can gyi rdo ba
T02D2498:264b-38: rgan po 'di dag yongs su spang ngo //
T02D2498:264b-39: de ltar shis pa dang mi shes pa'i rdo ba
T02D2498:264b-40: rnams shes par byas nas shis pa'i rdo ba rnams
T02D2498:264b-41: pa yi rnam lngas byugs te dri bzang po'i chus
T02D2498:264b-42: khrus byas nas dri la sogs pa rnams kyis rgyas
T02D2498:264b-43: pa'i sems kyis mngon par mchod de shing gi skabs
T02D2498:264b-44: su bshad pa'i las rnams thams cad 'dir yang bya'o
T02D2498:265a-0: // de nas grong khyer du 'jug pa'i @265a * //
T02D2498:265a-2: rdo ba rnams rgyal po'i skyes bu rnams kyis rgyas
T02D2498:265a-3: pa'i sems kyis drang bar bya zhing snga ma bzhin
T02D2498:265a-4: du mar me dang sil snyan sna tshogs kyi sgra
T02D2498:265a-5: dang ca co dang bcas te shin tu gus pa
T02D2498:265a-7: rgya che zhing mnyam pa'i sar bkod de padma'i dbus su gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2498:265a-8: gtsug lag khang sogs bzhengs pa la nye bar mkho
T02D2498:265a-9: ba'i sa brtag pa dang shing dang rdo ba'i cho
T02D2498:265a-10: ga 'di sngags kyi gzhung lugs che ba zhig gis
T02D2498:265a-12: 'di'i rgya dpe gnyal gyi phyogs nas rnyed de lha
T02D2498:265a-13: dang bcas pa'i skye dgu mtha' dag gi gtsug gi
T02D2498:265a-14: nor bus zhabs rten gyi padma la phyag byas pa'i
T02D2498:265a-15: 'dren pa dam pa chos kyi rje rin po che
T02D2498:265a-16: zhva dmar cod pan 'dzin pa bzhi pa'i zhal snga
T02D2498:265a-17: nas bsgyur cig ces gsung pa bzhin du zha lu
